pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 7, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 7, 2016:

Sudbury, Ontario

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with Paul Lefebvre, MP for Sudbury, Marc Serré, MP for Nickel Belt, Anthony Rota, MP for Nipissing - Timiskaming, Glenn Thibeault, MPP for Sudbury, Brian Bigger, Mayor of Sudbury, and city councillors from the City of Sudbury.

City Hall
Room C-11
200 Brady Street
Sudbury, Ontario

Notes for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
  • Photo opportunity only

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and will hold a media availability.

City Hall
Atrium
200 Brady Street
Sudbury, Ontario

Media appearances

Montréal, Quebec

7:25 a.m. (Live)  Puisqu’il faut se lever, 98.5 FM

8:15 a.m. (Live)  Gravel le matin, ICI Radio-Canada Première

8:40 a.m. (Live)  Salut Bonjour, TVA

12:00 p.m.  News at Noon, CTV Montreal

Sudbury, Ontario

5:45 p.m. (Live)  Ça parle au Nord, ICI Radio-Canada Première

Please note: all times are local.
